name: Back At You Media
tag_list: marketing, social-media, facebook, twitter, digital-marketing, promotions
overview:
If Zillow, Buddy Media and Facebook all got together, Back At You Media would be the result. Our technology today focuses on leveraging Real Estate referrals and lead generation on Facebook. We have automated the process of building, engaging and lead generating in a full service, one-click solution, for Realtors to build their business online. Realtors can “set it” and “forget it” while our technology service build leads and keeps the Realtor active and top of mind in front of their referral network.

We have created multiple technologies that leverage Facebook and it’s referral strengths to make sure a Realtor is staying top of mind and active in front of potential clients. What is difficult is combining these technologies into one offering that is scalable for Back At You Media and also cost-effective for clients. That is what makes us so unique and allows us to offer our service to thousands of clients.
